name: ShrekGame
0:
”Alexa, tell Shrek the Ogre, Shrek”
”Shrek”
”Not Shrek”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shrek the ogre
des: In the game, the player and Alexa will say the name "Shrek" back and forth until the player decides to say something else. When this happens, Alexa flips a fair coin to see who won.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
